overview: Eyal Magen is CEO and co-founder of Gigya Inc., a Software as a Service (SaaS) technology company that makes websites social, integrating online businesses with the top social networks and identity providers including Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn and consolidating the most powerful social features in a single solution. Prior to Gigya he served as VP Products and General Manger of Hotbar.com, a leading contextual advertising company. Before that Eyal served as Director of Business Development at, Kidum ltd, a leading global eLearning enterprise. Eyal hold a B.A. in psychology and sociology from Tel Aviv University.
